row.scheme:
;;;;StagedDelete Deletes a chord one note at a time, finally ending at non-printing rest and then deleting that (if (Music?) (if (d-GetNonprinting) ;;; non-printing (if (d-GetNotes) (d-RemoveNoteFromChord) (d-DeleteObject))
;;; an ordinary black note or rest (if (d-GetNotes) (d-RemoveNoteFromChord) (d-SetNonprinting))) ;;; not a music object (d-DeleteObject))
(d-RefreshDisplay)
row._tooltip: Deletes the object at the cursor. For Chords it deletes the chord stage by stage.
